lines: khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba'i pho brang na
rin cen khri la lha dbang brgya byin ni
dga' mgur 'dod yon dag la spyod pa'i tshe
sngon gyi las dang 'phral rkyen gyis bskul te
glo bur bdud bzhi'i thibs kyis non par gyur
bde med sdug bsngal drag pos gzir ba las
bcom ldan shAkya'i gtso la skyabs song bas
de tshe bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yi
'gro ba kun la phan phyir ting 'dzin gyis
sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs bshams nas
mchod sbyin phyag rgya mthun pa'i rdzas bsags nas
skye mched mu bzhi'i gnas nas bdud bzhi rnams
thugs rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas phyag sor bzhir
bkod nas brgya bzhi'i mchod sbyin byin pa yin
brgya byin nad dang sdug bsngal kun las thar
mi gnas myang 'das thob la bar du gcod
phung po'i bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod phyir gshegs su gsol
rnam shes mtha' yas lha yi pho brang nas
gnas lugs mngon sum mthong la bar du gcod
nyon mongs bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod phyir gshegs su gsol
ci yang med pa'i lha yi pho brang nas
'dod pa'i longs spyod thob la bar du gcod
lha'i bu'i bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod phyir gshegs su gsol
'du shes med min lha yi pho brang nas
tshe srog mtha' ru phyin la bar du gcod
'chi bdag bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchod phyir gshegs su gsol
rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid
bsod nams zhing gi mchog gyur chos sku'i rten
ri rab tshar du dngar ba'i mchod rten brgya
phung po'i bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
me long ye shes rnam dag chos kyi sku
bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad sku thob nas
'gro kun phung po'i bdud las thar gyur cig
stong gsum tshar du dngar ba'i snod rnams su
'bru mar rtsi mar rgya mtshor 'khyil ba'i dbus
ri rab lta bu'i mar me'i sdong bu la
nyi zla lta bu'i 'od 'bar snang gsal brgya
nyon mongs bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
mnyam nyid ye shes rnam dag chos kyi sku
bcom ldan rin cen 'byung ldan sku thob nas
'gro kun nyon mongs bdud las thar gyur cig
rab yangs nam mkha' lta bu'i snod rnams su
'chi med bdud rtsi'i btung ba mtsho ltar bskyil
bza' dang bca' ba ri rab lta bur spungs
bkod mdzes sha khrag brgyan pa'i gtor ma brgya
lha'i bu'i bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
sor rtog ye shes rnam dag chos kyi sku
bcom ldan 'od dpag med pa'i sku thob nas
'gro kun lha'i bu'i bdud las rgyal gyur cig
'bru zan rin cen rnam pa lnga las byung
gzugs mdzes dbyangs snyan yid dang dbang po gsal
mdzes pa gcig tu bsdus pa nor mang ldan
yon tan brgya phrag ldan pa'i ngar glud brgya
'chi bdag bdud tshogs 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
bya sgrub ye shes rnam dag chos kyi sku
bcom ldan don yod grub pa'i sku thob nas
'gro kun 'chi bdag bdud las thar gyur cig
rang bzhin rnam dag ngang du ro gcig kyang
sgyu ma lta bu'i bdud bzhi'i dmag tshogs la
mig 'phrul lta bu'i brgya bzhi'i mchod pa 'di
brag ca lta bu'i dbyangs kyis mchod par bgyi
sprul pa lta bu'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la
chos dbyings rnam par dag pa chos kyi sku
bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje'i sku thob nas
'gro kun bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal gyur cig
lnga pa mchod pa gzhan dbul ba ni
kye! rgya mtsho lta bur 'khyil ba'i mchod yon dang
gang+gA'i rgyun ltar 'bab pa'i zhabs bsil dang
kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba'i me tog dang
dud sprin nam mkha' gang ba'i bdug spos dang
rab 'bar tshar du dngar ba'i mar me dang
cig car dri bzang 'gyed pa'i dri chab dang
ro nus phun sum tshogs pa'i zhal zas dang
rnar snyan rol mo'i bye brag sna tshogs pa
bdud bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs la 'bul
mig gi dga' ston spungs pa'i gzugs mchog dang
brjod bral rna bar snyan pa'i sgra snyan dang
dri bsung phyogs bcur 'phro ba'i dri chab dang
kha dog ro nus ldan pa'i zhal zas dang
reg na bde ba skyed pa'i gos mchog kyang
bdud bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs la 'bul
'khor lo nor bu btsun mo blon po dang
glang po rta mchog dmag dpon rin cen bdun
bkra shis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan g.yas 'khyil dang
gser nya dpal be'u bum pa padma dkar
nam mkha' gang ba'i bkra shis rtags dang rdzas
bdud bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs la 'bul
bkod mdzes ri rab lta bu'i gtor ma 'di
sha dang khrag gis brgyan cing byin brlabs te
bdud bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs la 'bul
bzhes la phyi nang 'gal rkyen zhi bar mdzod
kha 'bar mas sngags kyis bsngos la phud kyis mchod
'gro ba kun gyi gzugs kyi phung po la
dbang sgyur stobs ldan phung po'i bdud tshogs la
phyag 'tshal mchod cing bdag gis bstod par bgyi
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas shing
'gro ba kun gyi tshor ba'i phung po la
dbang bsgyur stobs ldan nyon mongs bdud tshogs la
phyag 'tshal mchod cing bdag gis bstod par bgyi
ci yang med pa'i skye mched la gnas shing
'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes phung po la
dbang sgyur stobs ldan lha'i bu'i bdud tshogs la
phyag 'tshal mchod cing bdag gis bstod par bgyi
yod min med min skye mched la gnas shing
'gro ba kun gyi 'du byed phung po la
dbang sgyur stobs ldan 'chi bdag bdud tshogs la
phyag 'tshal mchod cing bdag gis bstod par bgyi
bdud bzhi'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i tshogs rnams la
mchod sbyin gtor ma rgya chen 'di phul bas
gnod dang gdug pa'i 'tshe ba kun zhi nas
bdud bzhi'i dgra las rtag tu rgyal gyur cig
bdud bzhi'i dmag tshogs 'khor bcas rnams
mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la
bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams la
bdud kyi bar chad med pa dang
nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang
dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang
longs spyod rgya chen kun thob mdzod
zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi
las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol
rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan
lo skag zla skag zhag skag dang
bdud bzhi'i dmag tshogs dgra la sgyur
gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya ldan pa'i rdzas
dbang po drug la rmad byung bde chen skyed
ro brgya ldan pa'i tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di
bdud bzhi bdud kyi dmag tshogs rnams la 'bul
lus sems ting 'dzin zas kyis tshim gyur nas
zag med ting 'dzin zas la spyod gyur cig
gsum pa mjug gi bya ba la gnyis
sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras pa'i ngar glud 'di
sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams kyis
nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar byin brlabs nas
bdag cag rgyu sbyor sbyin bdag 'khor bcas kyi
glud du bdud bzhi'i dmag tshogs rnams la 'bul
nor ldan mdzes pa'i ngar glud 'di bzhes shig
mtshar sdug ldan pa'i ngar glud 'di bzhes shig
lta na sdug pa'i ngar glud 'di bzhes shig
yon tan brgya phrag ldan pa 'di bzhes shig
kye! rin cen mdzes pa'i ngar glud rgyan ldan 'di
rnam thos bu la 'gran zhing nor mang ldan
skabs gsum dbang po'i phun tshogs la 'khu zhing
nag po'i sde las rgyal bar byed pa 'di
rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba bdag cag dang
rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po'i glud du 'bul
mi las glud dga' mdzes pa'i glud bzhes la
bdud bzhi'i dmag tshogs sdang ba'i dgra la sgyur
bzung ba yod na da lta nyid du thongs
bcings pa yod na skad cig nyid la khrol
bdud kyi khram la btab na khram kha phyis
btsan gyi sho rde bkye na sho rde skyungs
klu yi byad du tshud na byad thag chod
rgyal po'i smyo 'bog gtong ba dgra la sgyur
the'u rang sri la rku na dgra la sgyur
bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dgra la sgyur
gdon rigs sum brgya drug cu dgra la sgyur
lo dang zla ba'i skag rnams dgra la sgyur
zhag dang za ma'i skag rnams dgra la sgyur
rmi lam mtshan ma ngan pa dgra la sgyur
bdud kyi dmag tshogs thams cad dgra la sgyur
'byung po'i dal yams thams cad dgra la sgyur
